sentence.Network_en: The most serious cause of dispersion is usually thrust misalignment.

sentence.Network_en: A recent study investigated the effects of real exchange rate misalignment and instability on economic performance.
sentence.Network_cn: 最近的一项研究调查了实际汇率失调和动荡对经济实绩的影响.

sentence.Network_en: The maximum allowable misalignment of the coupling is 0.02 mm.
sentence.Network_cn: 靠背轮找正的最大允许偏差为0.02毫米.
